https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5JCMlGHkwYoNZFLL9xJYQIfiXGM.jpg How does one live with the unbearable? When the worst has happened and the one to blame is yourself? Death of a Child is an exploration of the lives of parents who have caused their own children's deaths. Death of a Child
